tswitem.name: Signet of the Death Curse
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of the Death Curse
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever your health drops below 10% you are silenced and unable to be defeated for 3 seconds. When this effect expires, you are defeated and you deal 1000/2000/3000 physical damage to enemies near you. This Signet can be attached to Major Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
